functions.doc:
Display a menu prompt and wait for a response. Continues to prompt
until an option from the menu is selected.

> **Note:** Not available in apply block

signatures.key: prompt::menu(String $prompt, Array[Variant[Target, Data]] $menu, Optional[Hash[String[1], Variant[Target, Data]]] $options)
signatures.doc: Select from a list of options.

parameters.name: menu
parameters.doc: A list of options to choose from.

signatures.key: prompt::menu(String $prompt, Hash[String[1], Variant[Target, Data]] $menu, Optional[Hash[String[1], Variant[Target, Data]]] $options)
signatures.doc: Select from a list of options with custom inputs.

parameters.name: menu
parameters.doc: A hash of options to choose from, where keys are the input used to select a value.
